alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 7:12PM CDT until April 03 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTY... At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Cranfills Gap, or 10 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Hico, Fairy and Olin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
